{"step_by_step_thinking": "Eisenmenger's complex is a severe form of pulmonary heart disease. Coarctation of the aorta is a congenital condition characterized by a narrowing of the aorta. Mitral stenosis is a narrowing of the mitral valve in the heart. Aortic stenosis is a narrowing of the aortic valve in the heart. Among these, Eisenmenger's complex is associated with the highest maternal mortality due to the significant strain it places on the heart and the increased risk of complications during pregnancy.", "answer_choice": "A. Eisenmenger's complex"}
